snippet.title: Gem Wizards Tactics - The Omni-Gem
snippet.description:
This is an introduction movie for our tactical strategy game, Gem Wizards Tactics. Art by Peter Siesienski. Everything else by Keith Burgun.


Follow Peter on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/beosnook
Sign up for our mailing list: http://www.keithburgun.net/signup
Gem Wizards Tactics on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1360270/Gem_Wizards_Tactics/

Follow Keith Burgun Games:
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/keithburgungames
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Keith-Burgun-Games-2149158955361127


#tactics #turnbased #indiedev #gamedev #pixelart #illustration #wargames #advancewars
